item.title: Lee Burton wins NSFC International Young Scientists award 2019
item.description: The National Science Foundation of China (NSFC) award for international young scientists in China.

item.title: Lee Burton wins Eastern Young Scholar Award 2018
item.description: The Eastern Young Scholar award is a 3-year early-career fellowship for scientists working in the east of China.

item.title: Lee Burton wins E.U. Seal of Excellence award 2017
item.description: The Seal of Excellence award is issued by the European Commission as an endorsement of scientists for future grant applications.

item.title: High-Throughput Identification of Electrides from All Known Inorganic Materials
item.description: Analyzing a database of density functional theory results on more than 60â€¯000 compounds, we identify 65 new electride candidates and recover 4 already known.
